Package pfriendly

Class Yup2

  • java.lang.Object
    • processing.core.PImage
      • processing.core.PGraphics
        • processing.opengl.PGraphicsOpenGL
          • pfriendly.UpOgl
            • pfriendly.Yup2
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, IUp, IUpOgl, IYup2, processing.core.PConstants
    public class Yup2
extends UpOgl
implements IYup2, IUpOgl
    A 2.5D renderer based on OpenGL. Supposes that the the camera is looking down on a 2D plane from the z axis, making (0.0, 1.0) the forward -- or up -- axis.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface pfriendly.IUpOgl

        IUpOgl.Sampling

        rect in interface IYup2
        Parameters:
        a - the first parameter
        b - the second parameter

      • rotate

        public void rotate​(float angle)
        Rotates the modelview matrix around the z axis by an angle in radians.
        Overrides:
        rotate in class processing.opengl.PGraphicsOpenGL
        Parameters:
        angle - the angle in radians

      • rotateX

        public void rotateX​(float angle)
        Rotates the sketch by an angle in radians around the y axis. For 2D, this scales by ( 1.0, cos ( a ) ) .
        Overrides:
        rotateX in class processing.opengl.PGraphicsOpenGL
        Parameters:
        angle - the angle
        See Also:
        PApplet.cos(float)

      • rotateY

        public void rotateY​(float angle)
        Rotates the sketch by an angle in radians around the y axis. For 2D, this scales by ( cos ( a ), 1.0 ) .
        Overrides:
        rotateY in class processing.opengl.PGraphicsOpenGL
        Parameters:
        angle - the angle
        See Also:
        PApplet.cos(float)

        Overrides:
        rotateZ in class processing.opengl.PGraphicsOpenGL
        Parameters:
        angle - the angle in radians

      • setSize

        public void setSize​(int iwidth,
                    int iheight)
        Set size is the last function called by size, createGraphics, makeGraphics, etc. when initializing the graphics renderer. Therefore, any additional values that need initialization can be attempted here.
        Overrides:
        setSize in class UpOgl
        Parameters:
        iwidth - the applet width
        iheight - the applet height
